data.title: Bed & Breakfast and Guesthouse
data.meta_description: Zetana is a beautiful bed and breakfast with 8 rooms individually decorated with en suite bathrooms. - Zetana Guesthouse is a Bed & Breakfast and Guesthouse in Burgersdorp Eastern Cape South Africa
data.text:
Book Now

Zetana Guesthouse is a beautiful bed and breakfast ideal for relaxation in a tranquil environment. It is situated in a quiet neighbourhood in Burgersdorp. Essentially a sheep-farming community, the little town is rich in character and well worth a visit.

The Guesthouse offers four luxurious en-suite rooms, all with flat screen televisions, bar fridges and snack trays. At Zetana, we strive for individual attention and satisfaction.

Described as the oldest town in the North Eastern Cape, Burgersdorp lies south in the tip of an inverted triangle between Aliwal North and Venterstad.

Many regard the beautiful town, surrounded by the Stormberg Mountains, as the cultural heart of the northern reaches of the province with no fewer than 10 national monuments; the museum alone is made up of four buildings and a visit is a must.

Accommodation at Zetana Guesthouse:

Zetana offers 8 luxurious room each individually decorated. Each with flat screen television, bar fridge, air con and lounge.

Facilities & Services available:

Honeymoon Couples

Ironing Service

Limited Room Service

Special Meals on Request

Self-Braai / Barbecue

Jacuzzi

Fireplace on the Premises

Garden

Internet Access

Wi-Fi

Afrikaans

English

Cancellation Policy:

- Bookings are only confirmed when a deposit of 50% is received

- An admin fee of 15% will be charged for cancellations and refunds

- Cancellations within 48 hours of arrival date and early departures forfeit deposit
